items.title: 苹果就欧盟5亿欧元“前所未有”的App Store引导规则罚款提出上诉 (原标题: Apple Challenges 'Unprecedented' €500M EU Fine Over App Store Steering Rules)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# 苹果就欧盟5亿欧元App Store引导规则罚款提出上诉

*   **罚款背景与金额**
    *   苹果公司正在就欧盟对其处以的5亿欧元（约合5.7亿美元）罚款提出上诉。
    *   欧盟指控苹果违反了《数字市场法案》（Digital Markets Act, DMA）。
    *   罚款原因：限制应用开发者告知用户App Store之外的购买选项。

*   **欧盟委员会的裁决与要求**
    *   欧盟委员会（EC）裁定，通过苹果App Store分发应用的开发者应能够免费告知客户App Store之外的替代优惠，引导他们并允许进行购买。
    *   除了罚款，欧盟委员会还命令苹果改变其App Store关于引导的规则，否则将面临进一步罚款。

*   **苹果的回应与立场**
    *   苹果向MacRumors表示，此次罚款是“前所未有”的，并且“远远超出了法律要求”。
    *   苹果已提起上诉，认为欧盟委员会的决定及其“前所未有”的罚款，强制其运营商店并推行对开发者造成困惑、对用户不利的商业条款。
    *   为避免惩罚性每日罚款，苹果已在6月下旬实施了欧盟要求的更改。

*   **App Store规则的更改**
    *   通过欧盟店面分发的应用现在可以自由链接到App Store之外的优惠。
    *   应用甚至可以提供不使用苹果应用内购买系统的替代购买选项。

*   **新的费用结构（2026年1月1日起生效）**
    *   所有欧盟开发者将支付核心技术佣金（Core Technology Commission）、初始获取费和商店服务费。
    *   费用将根据开发者选择的App Store服务级别而异，小企业计划参与者将支付较低费用。
    *   新系统下，使用苹果全套服务的App Store应用分发最高费用为20%，比之前的30%降低了10%。
    *   引入了分级系统以降低费用：
        *   **第一层（强制）**：费用较低，但苹果不提供自动应用更新、评分、评论、搜索建议、App Store功能和营销以及分析等服务。
        *   **第二层（可选）**：提供所有当前App Store服务。
    *   苹果表示，欧盟委员会要求其提供不同层级，允许开发者为较少服务支付较少费用，导致了新的、更复杂的系统。
    *   欧盟委员会还指示苹果哪些服务开发者应能选择退出，导致苹果将搜索发现和浏览选项从强制层中移除。

*   **苹果的上诉论点**
    *   苹果计划辩称欧盟委员会正在指示其如何运营业务。
    *   苹果还将指出欧盟委员会将“引导”（steering）的定义扩大到超出法律要求的范围。

*   **相关图片**
    *   ![App Store vs EU Feature 2](https://images.macrumors.com/t/epdz_AffekLOhrFdlKPirJRo3Wo=/400x0/article-new/2024/01/App-Store-vs-EU-Feature-2.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果已就欧盟因其App Store引导规则违反《数字市场法案》而处以的5亿欧元罚款提出上诉。苹果称此罚款“前所未有”，并认为欧盟委员会的决定超越了法律要求，强制其运营商店。为避免进一步罚款，苹果已更改规则，允许开发者引导用户至App Store外部购买，并更新了费用结构。苹果将辩称欧盟委员会干预其业务运营，并扩大了“引导”的定义。
items.translated_title: 苹果就欧盟5亿欧元“前所未有”的App Store引导规则罚款提出上诉
items.content:
Apple is appealing the 500 million euro ($570 million) fine that it is facing in the European Union for allegedly violating the Digital Markets Act.


In a statement to MacRumors, Apple said that the fine is unprecedented, and goes beyond what the law requires.
Today we filed our appeal because we believe the European Commission's decision--and their unprecedented fine--go far beyond what the law requires. As our appeal will show, the EC is mandating how we run our store and forcing business terms which are confusing for developers and bad for users. We implemented this to avoid punitive daily fines and will share the facts with the Court.

Apple was fined in April for restricting app developers from informing users about purchase options available outside of the App Store. The European Commission said that developers should have the ability to direct customers to outside of the ‌App Store‌.

"App developers distributing their apps via Apple's ‌App Store‌ should be able to inform customers, free of charge, of alternative offers outside the ‌App Store‌, steer them to those offers and allow them to make purchases," said the EC in its ruling.

Besides fining Apple 500 million euros, the EC also ordered Apple to change its ‌App Store‌ rules around steering or face further fines. Apple made the required changes in late June to prevent being further penalized during the appeals process. Apps that are distributed through EU storefronts can now freely link to deals available outside of the ‌App Store‌, and can even provide alternate purchase options that don't use Apple's in-app purchase system.

Apple also updated its fee structure in the European Union, and by January 1, 2026, all EU developers will pay a Core Technology Commission, an initial acquisition fee, and a store services fee. Fees will vary based on the level of ‌App Store‌ service that developers opt to use, and Small Business Program participants will pay lower fees. The maximum fee under the new system for ‌App Store‌ app distribution with Apple's full suite of services is 20 percent, 10 percent lower than the prior 30 percent fee.

There is a tiered system for ‌App Store‌ services to lower fees. Developers that want to pay less can choose tier 1, and Apple will not provide automatic app updates, ratings, reviews, search suggestions, ‌App Store‌ features and marketing, and analytics. Tier 2 provides all of the current ‌App Store‌ services. Tier 1 is mandatory, and tier 2 is optional.

Apple says that the European Commission required it to offer different tiers that would let developers pay less for fewer services, which is why there is a new, more complex system. The EC also instructed Apple on which services developers should be able to opt out of, resulting in Apple moving search discovery and browse options out of its mandatory tier.

Apple plans to argue that the EC is telling it how to operate its business, and that the commission has expanded the definition of steering beyond what the law requires.
Tags: App Store, European Commission, European Union

This article, "Apple Challenges 'Unprecedented' €500M EU Fine Over App Store Steering Rules" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums

items.title: TikTok将于9月为美国用户推出新应用 (原标题: TikTok to Launch New App for US Users in September)
items.creator: Hartley Charlton
items.summary:
## TikTok将为美国用户推出新应用

TikTok计划于**9月5日**在美国应用商店推出一款**全新的美国专属应用**。此举是为遵守美国联邦立法而进行的持续努力的一部分，该立法要求TikTok因国家安全担忧剥离其美国业务。

### 应用版本更迭与用户迁移
*   现有TikTok版本（内部代号“M”）将在新应用发布当天从美国应用商店下架。
*   美国用户将被引导下载替代版本，内部代号为“M2”。
*   美国TikTok用户需在**2026年3月**前迁移至新版本，以保持对平台的访问权限。现有应用将在该日期后停止运行。

### 技术与规模挑战
*   苹果不允许开发者在单一应用列表中创建区域特定版本，这意味着TikTok必须以新的App Store条目和独立的捆绑标识符发布“M2”。
*   对于TikTok这样拥有约1.7亿美国用户的应用而言，此举实属罕见。

### 数据与所有权
*   作为此次转换的一部分，所有用户数据将转移到美国境内的基础设施。
*   新版美国应用将由一个美国所有权集团（包括Oracle）负责监督管理。

### 图片
*   ![TikTok on iPhone](https://images.macrumors.com/t/gxOBHsUe64OkgkG-xILZDCyhdMk=/400x0/article-new/2025/01/TikTok-on-iPhone.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: TikTok将于9月5日在美国推出一款新的专属应用“M2”，以遵守美国政府因国家安全担忧而提出的剥离要求。现有应用“M”将下架，美国用户需在2026年3月前迁移至新版本，否则将无法使用。所有用户数据将转移至美国基础设施，并由美国所有权集团（包括Oracle）监督。此举对拥有1.7亿美国用户的TikTok而言是罕见的。
items.translated_title: TikTok将于9月为美国用户推出新应用
items.content:
TikTok will launch a new U.S.-exclusive version of its app on app stores on September 5, as part of an ongoing effort to comply with federal legislation requiring the divestment of its American operations due to national security concerns, The Information reports.


The existing version of TikTok, internally codenamed "M," will be removed from U.S. app stores on the day of the new app's debut, and users will be directed to download the replacement version, internally referred to as "M2."

U.S. TikTok users will need to migrate to the new version in order to maintain access to the platform beyond March 2026. The current app will cease functioning after that date.

Apple does not allow developers to create region-specific forks of apps within a single listing, meaning TikTok is required to distribute "‌M2‌" as a distinct bundle identifier under a new App Store entry. The move is unusual for an app of TikTok's scale, especially given its estimated 170 million U.S. users. All user data will reportedly be transferred to U.S.-based infrastructure as part of the switch.

The decision to release a separate app for the United States follows the passage of a law by Congress mandating that Chinese parent company ByteDance either sell its U.S. TikTok business or face a nationwide ban. The U.S. version of the app will then will be managed under the oversight of a U.S.-based ownership group, including Oracle.
Tags: Oracle, The Information, TikTok

This article, "TikTok to Launch New App for US Users in September" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums

items.title: iPhone 17 Pro 新渲染图揭示苹果标志和 MagSafe 设计变化 (原标题: New iPhone 17 Pro Renders Highlight Apple Logo and MagSafe Design Changes)
items.creator: Hartley Charlton
items.summary:
## iPhone 17 Pro 设计变化亮点

最新的渲染图展示了 iPhone 17 Pro 和 iPhone 17 Pro Max 的多项设计改动，主要集中在苹果标志的重新定位和 MagSafe 磁吸阵列的重新设计上。

### 主要设计变化：

*   **苹果标志重新定位**：
    *   苹果标志将移至设备背面下方，位于一个新的玻璃切口中央。
    *   这一变化使得标志相对于设备整体高度而言位置更低。

*   **MagSafe 磁吸阵列重新设计**：
    *   为了避免透明保护壳上的 MagSafe 磁环遮挡重新定位的苹果标志，苹果将改变其独特的 MagSafe 磁吸阵列。
    *   新的设计将在圆形磁环上增加一个“断点”，以确保苹果标志能够清晰地显示出来。

*   **摄像头凸起设计**：
    *   摄像头凸起将变得更长，横跨设备整个宽度。
    *   LiDAR 扫描仪和闪光灯将移至右侧。

*   **机身框架**：
    *   设备预计将采用铝制框架，以容纳新的摄像头凸起设计，类似于 iPad Pro。
    *   为了实现无线充电，铝制框架在摄像头凸起下方将有一个玻璃切口。

### 渲染图来源与发布：

*   知名爆料人“Majin Bu”的最新渲染图展示了 iPhone 17 Pro 和 iPhone 17 Pro Max 在透明保护壳中的样子，清晰地呈现了苹果如何通过改变 MagSafe 磁吸阵列来显示重新定位的标志。
*   iPhone 17 Pro 和 iPhone 17 Pro Max 预计将于今年秋季发布。

### 预期升级：

*   4800万像素长焦摄像头
*   2400万像素前置摄像头
*   A19 Pro 芯片
items.shortSummary: iPhone 17 Pro 的新渲染图揭示了多项设计变化。苹果标志将重新定位到设备背面下方中央的玻璃切口处。为配合这一变化，MagSafe 磁吸阵列将重新设计，在磁环上增加一个断点，以确保标志可见。此外，摄像头凸起将加长并横跨设备宽度，采用铝制框架，并预计搭载48MP长焦、24MP前置摄像头和A19 Pro芯片，预计秋季发布。
items.translated_title: iPhone 17 Pro 新渲染图揭示苹果标志和 MagSafe 设计变化
items.content:
New renders today provide the best look yet relocated Apple logo and redesigned MagSafe magnet array of the iPhone 17 Pro and ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ Max.

Image via Majin Bu.

Several of the design changes coming to the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ model have been rumored for some time, such as the elongated camera bump that spans the full width of the device, with the LiDAR Scanner and flash moving to the right side.

The device is also expected to move to an aluminum frame that encompasses the new camera bump design, similar to the iPad Pro. To enable wireless charging, there will be a cutout in the aluminum frame below the camera bump for a glass segment.

Most recently, it emerged that the Apple logo will likely be repositioned to the center of this glass segment. The repositioning means the Apple logo will now appear lower than before when viewed relative to the full height of the device.

This has a subsequent impact on the appearance of ‌MagSafe‌ accessories, since the magnetic ring on clear cases would obscure the Apple logo. To resolve this, Apple will apparently change the distinctive ‌MagSafe‌ magnet array to add a break in the circle to allow the Apple logo to show through.

The latest render from the leaker known as "Majin Bu" depicts both the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ and ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ Max in clear cases, showing how Apple apparently proposes to change the ‌MagSafe‌ magnet array to allow the relocated Apple to be clearly shown in its new, lower position, centered to the glass cutout.

The ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ and ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ Max is expected to launch in the fall, with upgrades including a 48-megapixel telephoto camera, 24-megapixel front-facing camera, and the A19 Pro chip.
Related Roundup: iPhone 17 Pro
Tag: Majin Bu
Related Forum: iPhone

This article, "New iPhone 17 Pro Renders Highlight Apple Logo and MagSafe Design Changes" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums

items.title: 苹果3.5亿美元豪赌《F1》开始见效 (原标题: Apple's $350 Million Gamble on 'F1' Is Starting to Pay Off)
items.creator: Hartley Charlton
items.summary:
## 苹果电影《F1》票房表现强劲

苹果公司最新的原创电影《F1：电影版》已成为其迄今为止票房最高的院线发行影片，上映十天内全球票房收入超过2.93亿美元，据《综艺》杂志报道。

![Apple TV F1](https://images.macrumors.com/t/XEy-8_iKoUBHNSs6rtYSeKcFtvw=/400x0/article-new/2025/03/Apple-TV-F1.jpeg?lossy)

### 票房里程碑

*   **全球首周末票房**：1.46亿美元。
*   **全球总票房（十天内）**：超过2.93亿美元。
*   **超越前作**：已超越雷德利·斯科特的《拿破仑》（2.21亿美元）和马丁·斯科塞斯的《花月杀手》（1.58亿美元），成为苹果迄今为止票房表现最佳的影片。
*   **此前表现不佳影片**：苹果此前的两部电影《飞向月球》（4200万美元）和《阿盖尔》（9600万美元）表现严重不佳。
*   **IMAX贡献**：IMAX影院放映贡献了全球6000万美元的票房，约占总票销售额的20%。

### 国际市场表现

*   **美国和加拿大**：迄今为止票房为1.095亿美元。
*   **主要国际市场**：
    *   中国：2200万美元
    *   英国：1730万美元
    *   墨西哥：1230万美元
    *   法国：1150万美元
    *   澳大利亚：980万美元

### 成本与盈利分析

*   **制作成本**：据估计已超过2.5亿美元。
*   **营销费用**：据报道又增加了1亿美元。
*   **总预算**：电影总预算估计高达3.5亿美元。
*   **盈利状况**：尽管票房表现超越了苹果此前的院线影片，但总票房收入仍低于如此高昂的综合预算所需的盈亏平衡点。
*   **收入分成**：票房收入通常由制片厂和影院分摊，制片厂通常获得国内票房收入的约50%，国际票房的份额更低。因此，仅凭院线票房收入，《F1》不太可能收回全部投资。

### 后续发行

*   在院线放映结束后，《F1》预计将于2025年晚些时候在Apple TV+上线。
items.shortSummary: 苹果电影《F1：电影版》成为其迄今为止票房最高的院线影片，上映十天内全球票房突破2.93亿美元。该片超越了《拿破仑》和《花月杀手》，IMAX贡献显著。尽管票房表现强劲，但由于其高达3.5亿美元的制作和营销预算，目前仅凭院线票房收入，该片可能尚未完全收回投资。电影预计将于2025年晚些时候在Apple TV+上线。
items.translated_title: 苹果3.5亿美元豪赌《F1》开始见效
items.content:
Apple's latest original film, "F1: The Movie," has become the company's highest-grossing theatrical release to date, earning over $293 million globally within ten days of release, Variety reports.


According to Variety, the film earned $146 million globally during its opening weekend and has since surpassed $293 million worldwide, overtaking Ridley Scott's "Napoleon" ($221 million) and Martin Scorsese's "Killers of the Flower Moon" ($158 million) as Apple's highest box office performer to date. Two of Apple's movies, "Fly Me to the Moon" ($42 million) and "Argylle" ($96 million), severely underperformed.

IMAX screenings have been a significant contributor to revenue, accounting for $60 million globally, or roughly 20% of total ticket sales. Outside of the United States and Canada, where F1 has grossed $109.5 million to date, the top-performing international markets include China ($22 million), the United Kingdom ($17.3 million), Mexico ($12.3 million), France ($11.5 million), and Australia ($9.8 million).

The production cost for F1 is estimated to have exceeded $250 million, with marketing expenses reportedly adding another $100 million. While the film's box office performance has exceeded that of Apple's previous theatrical titles, the total gross remains below the estimated break-even threshold for a film with such a high combined budget. Box office returns are also typically split between studios and exhibitors, with studios often receiving around 50% of domestic ticket revenue and a smaller share internationally. As a result, it is unlikely that F1 has yet recouped its full investment from theatrical ticket sales alone.

Following its run in theaters, F1 is expected to become available on Apple TV+ later in 2025.
Tags: Apple TV Plus, Variety

This article, "Apple's $350 Million Gamble on 'F1' Is Starting to Pay Off" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums

items.title: 提供iPhone车载钥匙的车型 (原标题: Here's Which Vehicles Offer iPhone Car Keys)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## iPhone车载钥匙功能概述

苹果于2020年在其Wallet应用中引入了数字车载钥匙功能，使用户能够通过iPhone或Apple Watch锁定、解锁和启动兼容车辆。目前，该功能已由部分汽车制造商提供，并计划进一步扩展。

![iPhone Car Key Kia](https://images.macrumors.com/t/bkch5KcQz8w6zq0cGTrQVGQGfKU=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/iPhone-Car-Key-Kia.jpg?lossy)

### 当前支持的汽车品牌和车型

以下是截至文章发布时，支持iPhone车载钥匙功能的最新车型列表：

*   **奥迪 (Audi)**
    *   2025年及更新的A5、Q5、SQ5、A6、S6、Q6、SQ6
*   **宝马 (BMW)**
    *   2021年及更新的1系、2系、3系、4系、5系、6系、8系、X5、X6、X7、X5 M、X6 M、Z4
    *   2022年及更新的i4、iX、iX1、iX3
    *   2023年及更新的i3、i7
    *   2024年及更新的i5
*   **MINI**
    *   Aceman (2024年5月起生产)
    *   Cooper (3门) C / S (2024年3月起生产)
    *   Cooper (3门) E / SE (2023年11月起生产)
    *   Cooper (5门) (2024年7月起生产)
    *   Countryman (2023年11月起生产)
*   **现代 (Hyundai)**
    *   2023年及更新的Palisade、IONIQ 6
    *   2024年及更新的Elantra、Kona、Santa Fe、Sonata
    *   2025年及更新的Tucson、Santa Cruz、IONIQ 5
    *   2026年及更新的IONIQ 9
*   **起亚 (Kia)**
    *   2023年及更新的Telluride、Niro、Seltos
    *   2024年及更新的EV3、EV6、EV9、Sorento
    *   2025年及更新的Carnival
*   **捷尼赛思 (Genesis)**
    *   2023年及更新的GV60、G90
    *   2024年及更新的G70
*   **梅赛德斯-奔驰 (Mercedes-Benz)**
    *   2024年及更新的E级
    *   2025年及更新的EQE、EQS
*   **极星 (Polestar)**
    *   所有Polestar 3和Polestar 4车型
*   **RAM**
    *   2025年及更新的RAM 1500
*   **沃尔沃 (Volvo)**
    *   2024年及更新的EX30、EX90
*   **路特斯 (Lotus)**
    *   2024年及更新的Eletre、Emeya
*   **其他已开始推广的汽车制造商:** 比亚迪 (BYD)、领克 (Lynk & Co)。可用性可能因国家/地区而异。

### 未来将支持的汽车品牌

在最近的WWDC 2025主题演讲中，苹果宣布以下13家汽车制造商将“很快”提供支持iPhone车载钥匙的车型：

*   讴歌 (Acura)
*   雪佛兰 (Chevrolet)
*   凯迪拉克 (Cadillac)
*   GMC
*   保时捷 (Porsche)
*   Rivian (包括第二代R1S和R1T及更新车型)
*   Smart
*   Lucid Motors
*   塔塔汽车 (Tata Motors)
*   红旗 (Hongqi)
*   WEY
*   奇瑞 (Chery)
*   岚图 (Voyah)
items.shortSummary: 苹果于2020年推出iPhone车载钥匙功能，允许用户通过iPhone或Apple Watch控制兼容车辆。目前，奥迪、宝马、现代、起亚、捷尼赛思、梅赛德斯-奔驰、沃尔沃等品牌的部分车型已支持此功能。苹果还宣布，讴歌、雪佛兰、保时捷、Rivian等13家汽车制造商将很快加入支持行列。该功能正在持续扩展，为用户提供便捷的数字钥匙体验。
items.content:
In 2020, Apple added a digital car key feature to its Wallet app, allowing users to lock, unlock, and start a compatible vehicle with an iPhone or Apple Watch. The feature is currently offered by select automakers, including Audi, BMW, Hyundai, Kia, Genesis, Mercedes-Benz, Volvo, and a handful of others, and it is set to expand further.


Apple has a web page with a list of vehicle models that support iPhone car keys, but it has not been updated in a while, so it is missing some recent additions. Our list below is more up to date, but if we are missing any vehicles, let us know.

Existing Vehicles

Audi

  • 2025 and newer A5

  • 2025 and newer Q5

  • 2025 and newer SQ5

  • 2025 and newer A6

  • 2025 and newer S6

  • 2025 and newer Q6

  • 2025 and newer SQ6

BMW

  • 2021 and newer 1 Series

  • 2021 and newer 2 Series

  • 2021 and newer 3 Series

  • 2021 and newer 4 Series

  • 2021 and newer 5 Series

  • 2021 and newer 6 Series

  • 2021 and newer 8 Series

  • 2021 and newer X5

  • 2021 and newer X6

  • 2021 and newer X7

  • 2021 and newer X5 M

  • 2021 and newer X6 M

  • 2021 and newer Z4

  • 2022 and newer i4

  • 2022 and newer iX

  • 2022 and newer iX1

  • 2022 and newer iX3

  • 2023 and newer i3

  • 2023 and newer i7

  • 2024 and newer i5

MINI

  • Aceman (produced from May 2024)

  • Cooper (3-door) C / S (produced from March 2024)

  • Cooper (3-door) E / SE (produced from November 2023)

  • Cooper (5-door) (produced from July 2024)

  • Countryman (produced from November 2023)

Hyundai

  • 2023 and newer Palisade

  • 2024 and newer Elantra

  • 2024 and newer Kona

  • 2024 and newer Santa Fe

  • 2024 and newer Sonata

  • 2025 and newer Tucson

  • 2025 and newer Santa Cruz

  • 2025 and newer IONIQ 5

  • 2023 and newer IONIQ 6

  • 2026 and newer IONIQ 9

Kia

  • 2023 and newer Telluride

  • 2023 and newer Niro

  • 2023 and newer Seltos

  • 2024 and newer EV3

  • 2024 and newer EV6

  • 2024 and newer EV9

  • 2024 and newer Sorento

  • 2025 and newer Carnival

Genesis

  • 2023 and newer GV60

  • 2023 and newer G90

  • 2024 and newer G70

Mercedes-Benz

  • 2024 and newer E‑Class

  • 2025 and newer EQE

  • 2025 and newer EQS

Polestar

  • All models of the Polestar 3

  • All models of the Polestar 4

RAM

  • 2025 and newer RAM 1500

Volvo

  • 2024 and newer EX30

  • 2024 and newer EX90

Lotus

  • 2024 and newer Eletre

  • 2024 and newer Emeya
A few other automakers have started rolling out iPhone car keys, such as BYD and Lynk & Co.

Availability may vary by country.

Future Vehicles


During its WWDC 2025 keynote last month, Apple said that the following 13 automakers would "soon" offer vehicle models with iPhone car keys:
  • Acura

  • Chevrolet

  • Cadillac

  • GMC

  • Porsche

  • Rivian

  • Smart

  • Lucid Motors

  • Tata Motors

  • Hongqi

  • WEY

  • Chery

  • Voyah
For Rivian, this will include the second-generation R1S and R1T and newer, according to a press release from more than a year ago.
Tags: Apple Wallet, iPhone Car Keys

This article, "Here's Which Vehicles Offer iPhone Car Keys" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums

items.title: AirPods Prime Day 优惠来袭：AirPods Pro 2 售价 $169，AirPods 4 售价 $99.99 (原标题: AirPods Prime Day Deals Arrive With AirPods Pro 2 at $169 and AirPods 4 at $99.99)
items.creator: Mitchel Broussard
items.summary:
# AirPods Prime Day 优惠

亚马逊在 Prime Day 之前提前推出了 AirPods 系列的优惠活动，多款产品价格下调。

## 主要优惠详情

*   **AirPods Pro 2**
    *   **售价：** $169.00 (原价 $249.00)
    *   **历史价格：** 这是 2025 年迄今为止追踪到的最佳价格，也是 AirPods Pro 2 总体第二好的价格。
    *   **配送：** 提供免费配送选项，预计送达日期约为 7 月 11 日。Prime 会员通常会更快收到。
    *   ![airpods prime day 2025](https://images.macrumors.com/t/OlTetev92jpO-mXsdXsYS4F3agY=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/airpods-prime-day-2025.jpeg?lossy)

*   **AirPods 4**
    *   **售价：** $99.99
    *   **历史价格：** 这是该产品的历史最低价。

*   **USB-C AirPods Max**
    *   **售价：** $479.99 (原价 $549.00)

## 其他相关信息

*   **联盟伙伴关系：** MacRumors 是亚马逊的联盟伙伴，通过其链接购买可能会获得少量佣金，以支持网站运营。
*   **更多优惠：**
    *   用户可以在 MacRumors 的专门帖子中找到所有最佳的早期 Prime Day 优惠。
    *   访问 Apple Deals 汇总页面，回顾过去一周最佳的苹果相关优惠。
    *   订阅 Deals Newsletter，获取 2025 年最佳优惠信息。

## 热门故事与产品传闻 (非 Prime Day 优惠内容)

文章中还包含了一些最新的苹果产品传闻和热门新闻，尽管它们与 Prime Day 优惠并非直接相关，但作为文章内容的一部分，在此一并列出：

*   **iPhone 17 Pro 传闻：**
    *   预计将在两个多月后发布。
    *   传闻中的 14 项新功能，包括苹果标志位置可能下移。

*   **iPhone 17 Pro Max 与 iPhone 17 Pro 对比：**
    *   iPhone 17 Pro：6.3 英寸显示屏。
    *   iPhone 17 Pro Max：6.9 英寸显示屏。
    *   Pro Max 因物理尺寸更大，可能拥有更大的电池。

*   **AirPods Pro 3 市场展望：**
    *   Counterpoint Research 预测，苹果在全球真无线立体声 (TWS) 耳机市场的主导地位将持续到 2025 年。
    *   2025 年全球 TWS 出货量预计同比增长 3%，标志着该类别从快速增长进入更成熟阶段。

*   **iPhone 17 Pro Max 电池容量泄露：**
    *   据爆料者“Instant Digital”称，iPhone 17 Pro Max 将配备 5,000mAh 电池，这将是 iPhone 史上最大的电池容量。

*   **支持 iPhone 车钥匙的车型：**
    *   苹果于 2020 年在 Wallet 应用中增加了数字车钥匙功能。
    *   目前支持该功能的汽车制造商包括奥迪、宝马、现代、起亚、捷尼赛斯、梅赛德斯-奔驰、沃尔沃等。

*   **Apple Watch Ultra 3 升级：**
    *   预计将于今年晚些时候发布。
    *   传闻将支持卫星连接和 5G 功能。

*   **2025 年下半年苹果新品预测：**
    *   尽管夏季通常是苹果的淡季，但传闻显示今年下半年将推出超过 15 款新产品，包括 iPhone 17 系列。

*   **M5 芯片传闻：**
    *   苹果下一代 M5 芯片预计将于今年晚些时候在五款新产品中首次亮相，包括 iPad Pro、Vision Pro、MacBook Pro、Mac mini 和 iMac。
    *   M5 芯片将采用台积电最新的第三代 3 纳米工艺制造，预计在性能和能效方面比 M4 芯片略有提升。
items.shortSummary: 亚马逊提前推出 Prime Day 优惠，AirPods Pro 2 降至 $169，AirPods 4 降至 $99.99（历史最低价），USB-C AirPods Max 售价 $479.99。这些优惠提供免费配送，Prime 会员可享更快送达。文章还提及了多项苹果产品传闻，如 iPhone 17 系列、AirPods Pro 3 市场展望、Apple Watch Ultra 3 升级及 M5 芯片等。
items.translated_title: AirPods Prime Day 优惠来袭：AirPods Pro 2 售价 $169，AirPods 4 售价 $99.99
items.content:
Amazon has the AirPods Pro 2 for $169.00 ahead of Prime Day, down from $249.00. Free delivery options provide an estimated delivery date of around July 11, while Prime members should get the headphones sooner in most cases.

Note: MacRumors is an affiliate partner with Amazon. When you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment, which helps us keep the site running.

Compared to past sales, this is a match of the best price we've tracked so far in 2025 and it's an overall solid second-best price on the AirPods Pro 2. Amazon also has the AirPods 4 available for $99.99 during this sale, an all-time low price.

$80 OFF
AirPods Pro 2 for $169.00

$29 OFF
AirPods 4 for $99.99

$30 OFF
AirPods 4 (ANC) for $148.99


We've begun tracking all of the best early Prime Day deals in our dedicated post, and it also includes every color of the USB-C AirPods Max on sale at $479.99, down from $549.00. If you're on the hunt for more discounts, be sure to visit our Apple Deals roundup where we recap the best Apple-related bargains of the past week.



Deals Newsletter


Interested in hearing more about the best deals you can find in 2025? Sign up for our Deals Newsletter and we'll keep you updated so you don't miss the biggest deals of the season!




Related Roundup: Apple Deals
